name: LootChachos
description:
Will you be available to make out the most out of you garden. Beware of animals and others robbers that might stole what you put so much labort into. Or maybe you shouldn't... ?

Point and click simulation about taking care and growing a garden.

Team:
- Luca Floreau (@Kiddy_Prod)
- Grégoire Boiron (@Graygzou)
